title: What is the timer thing next to someone that says ingame?
body: when you hover your mouse over a friend that is in game, there is a thing that tells you what recent trend of champ and lane they play etc. but i don't get what the little timer on the bottom right is, it is certainly not the in game time i sure. some one please explain.

replies.body:
I would suggest it's in game time. It was always there they just updated the look of it. 
What makes you think its not?

well, for example, my friend is in game for 19 mins (spectator mode) and the time next to the frame said 1455:45
the last two digits changes as seconds and the two middle digits change as minutes but i have no idea what the 14 stand for as it is the same for any other game that is going on.
Is it displaying absurd times such as 94 minutes and such? That's the brilliant work of daylight savings/not daylight savings time.
